author: Pepper
title: great small Alpha Team set
review:
I got this set for my birthday a few years ago. Pros. and cons.

Pros.
Dash
cool weapons (2 harpoon guns and a bazooka thing)
good pieces
sturdy

Cons.
no bad guys
LEGO discontinued the theme

Overall, great for a small set

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Alpha Team - AT Jet Sub
review:
The AT Jet Sub (4800) is a LEGO Alpha Team set which came out in 2002. It comes with 1 minifig and 23 pieces. This set does include no decals and there're no mistakes in the instructions and no missing pieces.

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/4800-1.jpg[/img]


Minifigures:

Agent Dash: Agent Dash comes with a blue suit with black fins, a dark gray air tank, a dark gray harpoon and a dark gray helmet with transparent blue goggles. On his face you can see gray eyes, a headset and a beard.

AT Jet Sub:

The at jet sub has a camera which does sviwel. On each side you can see a dark gray harpoon and on the back you can see two transparent yellow engines. Underneath the platform you can see a black slope. This set is very nice and easy to build.

Positive:

Great pieces which you can youse for brickfilms or MOC's
Minifig
No stickers

Negative:

Not so many play features.

All in all it's a great set to get and I would highly recommend you to get this model. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full galery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de/
